alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 3:50PM PST until December 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Multiple Winter Storms to Impact Holiday Mountain Travel through the Weekend... .A series of winter storms will bring multiple rounds of mountain snow and gusty winds today through Sunday. Snow showers will continue to impact the Coastal Range this afternoon, then spread into the Sierra this evening after midnight with up to 1 foot of snow above 5000-6500 feet through Wednesday afternoon. Heavier snow is forecast to start Wednesday evening and continue into the weekend with an additional 1-2 feet of snow possible each day over the western slopes and lowering snow levels. Major travel delays and difficult travel conditions are anticipated later this week. Gusty winds will further reduce visibilities during this event with local whiteout conditions possible. Holiday travelers should prepare for winter driving conditions by packing chains, warm winter clothes, and extra food and water. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Wet snow expected. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Tree branches could fall as well. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 4 feet, with localized amounts up to 9 feet, are expected. Total wet snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with localized amounts up to 1-2 feet, are expected through Wednesday afternoon. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, 4 PM Wednesday to 4 PM Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, 10 PM today to 4 PM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. Snow will spread south of I-80 after midnight today. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means there will be snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Travel is not recommended while the warning is in effect. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. A Winter Weather Advisory for wet snow means periods of wet snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
